## IAxisSeriesConfig interface

Relates a single axis to data series.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAxisSeriesConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color?](./chart-def.iaxisseriesconfig.color.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The color to render to assign to the series. |
|  [format?](./chart-def.iaxisseriesconfig.format.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The format for rendering values of the series. |
|  [label?](./chart-def.iaxisseriesconfig.label.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The label for the series on this axis. |
|  [series](./chart-def.iaxisseriesconfig.series.md) | string | The name of the series to render on the axis. |
